Languages.title: Kotlin
Languages.description: Kotlin is my best known programming language. I admire its null safety and string templates in comparison to Java. Additionally, I appreciate its functional programming capabilities.

Languages.title: Java
Languages.description: Java was the first programming language I learned. It offers a straightforward approach and is ideal for backend implementations.

Languages.title: TypeScript
Languages.description: TypeScript is my preferred language for complex web applications. Strong typing is essential when dealing with data from APIs.

Languages.title: JavaScript
Languages.description: Similar to TypeScript, JavaScript is a versatile language, sometimes favored for its flexibility when type constraints are not necessary.

Languages.title: Zig
Languages.description: Zig is my top choice for writing highly efficient and memory-safe code.

Languages.title: Python
Languages.description: Python is the go-to language for implementing simple algorithms and solving coding challenges with ease.

Languages.title: Sass
Languages.description: Sass is the better CSS for me. It enhances styling capabilities for web development.

Frameworks.title: React
Frameworks.description: React is my primary framework for modern web applications with stateful user interfaces.

Frameworks.title: Solid
Frameworks.description: Solid is similar to React but requires less JavaScript and offers a simpler feature set.

Frameworks.title: Electron
Frameworks.description: Electron is my preferred framework for building cross-platform desktop applications with modern features.

Frameworks.title: Tailwind
Frameworks.description: Tailwind is my choice for styling static web pages that don't require extensive custom CSS.

Frameworks.title: Selenium
Frameworks.description: Selenium is my tool of choice for web scraping and automation tasks.

Databases.title: SQL
Databases.description: I have extensive experience with SQL RDBMS like MySQL, MariaDB, and SQLite. SQL databases are my choice for quickly storing and retrieving user data and statistics.

Tools.title: IntelliJ IDEA
Tools.description: IntelliJ IDEA is my favorite IDE for Java and Kotlin programming. I appreciate its integrations with Docker, databases, and more.

Tools.title: VS Code
Tools.description: VS Code is my top pick for all things related to web development.

Tools.title: Figma
Tools.description: I use Figma to create layouts and components for websites and desktop apps.

Tools.title: GitHub
Tools.description: GitHub is where I host all my private and public Git repositories.

Tools.title: GitHub Actions
Tools.description: I primarily use GitHub Actions to run tests after commits and deploy updates to various platforms.
